ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
comments: It's a seminar class with different speakers. So we don't have homework outside the class.

narratives.question_text: Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: Overall, the seminar is very good. Some famous statistician were invited here to give a presentation. the topics varied in a different fields. It is helpful!
Some lectures are too in depth.
interesting topics but hard for the beginners
The seminars should be a one-semester commitment.
Advantage: This course shows us the most advanced progress in biostat which is good for our research.DIS: There are too many instructors we can hardly understand some of their research.

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: Bingqing Zhou  The instructor organized the seminar well.
Instructor: Bingqing Zhou  She is nice.
Instructor: Bingqing Zhou  not very familiar
Instructor: Bingqing Zhou  All the speakers and instructors are very nice. Thank you for their efforts in the whole semester.

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Sure, I will recommend this course. It is helpful to graduate student in their research!
I would like to recommend to students who have already covered two or three semester of fundamental courses.
bring your ears and heart! do not expect too much to get everything
Yes, I will. Cause it's a good choice to know what's really happening outside the campus.
I would recommend it to another student. The seminar was a great way to experience different approaches to modeling and research in general..
